pxchat.util
Class XMLUtil

java.lang.Object
  pxchat.util.XMLUtil

public class XMLUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides methods helping to parse XML files using a DOM parser.

Method Detail

getAttributeValue

public static java.lang.String getAttributeValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                                 java.lang.String attribute)
Returns an attribute value of a specified node. If this attribute does not exits an empty string will be returned.

Parameters:
node - The node containing the attribute.
attribute - The name of the attribute.
Returns:
The attribute value.

getAttributeValue

public static java.lang.String getAttributeValue(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                                 java.lang.String attribute,
                                                 java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns an attribute value of a specified node. If this attribute does not exits a specified default value will be returned.

Parameters:
node - The node containing the attribute.
attribute - The name of the attribute.
defaultValue - The value returned if the attribute does not exist.
Returns:
The attribute value.

getChildByName

public static org.w3c.dom.Node getChildByName(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                              java.lang.String name)
Returns the first child of a node with a specified name.

Parameters:
node - The parent node.
name - The name of the child.
Returns:
The first child of node named name.

getTextContent

public static java.lang.String getTextContent(org.w3c.dom.Node node)
Returns the text content of a node or an empty string if an error occurs.

Parameters:
node - The node.
Returns:
The text content or an empty string.

getTextContent

public static java.lang.String getTextContent(org.w3c.dom.Node node,
                                              java.lang.String defaultValue)
Returns the text content of a node or an empty string if an error occurs.

Parameters:
node - The node.
defaultValue - The default value.
Returns:
The text content or the default value.
